name: 36th Bank of Mammon
description:
It’s a bit of a mess, but it’s my mess and better yet - it’s broadly categorisable as complete.

You are Squita, an accountant at the 36th Bank of Mammon. You’re tasked with the job of hunting for prospective debters to take out a blood loan, prowling the streets for weak and forgotten souls and giving them some of your own lifeblood. When that loan matures, demons known as blood debts will spawn, and by defeating them you can reclaim the blood you paid in, plus a little extra. You can then use your newfound lifeblood to make even more loans or to pass on to your boss. You do have a quota to meet after all.

‘A’ and ‘D’ to move left and right. Spacebar to jump. Press and hold spacebar again in midair to fly. Left click to perform a swipe to fight the blood debts. Right click to perform a dash to avoid damage. And finally, press ‘E’ to interact.
